meanings.definition: In a way that causes revulsion or strong dislike.
meanings.sent1: She ate the spoiled food disgustingly.
meanings.sent3: The baby made a disgustingly funny face at the taste of the medicine.
meanings.sent4: The slimy texture of the food felt disgustingly like wet paper.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the decaying fruit was disgustingly unforgettable.

meanings.definition: To an extreme or excessive degree.
meanings.sent1: He disgustingly overate at the buffet.
meanings.sent2: The child disgustingly demanded more candy.
meanings.sent3: The cat disgustingly knocked over the entire stack of books.
meanings.sent4: The storm disgustingly flooded the streets with rain.
meanings.sent5: The price of the rare painting was disgustingly high.
